title: Overview of the etc5523nhu Package
text: etc5523nhu package provides data interactive Shiny app exploring burden healthcare-associated infections (HAIs) Germany EU/EEA, based Zacher et al.Â (2019). developed part ETC5523 â€“ Communicating Data: Assignment 4.

title: Overview of the etc5523nhu Package
text: dataset hai_burden created Table 2 Zacher et al.Â (2019) using R. first defined manually tibble::tribble() include estimated values infection type measure, reshaped long format using tidyr::pivot_longer(). also added simulated uncertainty intervals (ci_low ci_high) make plots realistic visually informative. Finally, dataset saved package usethis::use_data(hai_burden, overwrite = TRUE). Preview hai_burden dataset
code: library(etc5523nhu) data("hai_burden") knitr::kable(head(hai_burden), caption = "Preview of the hai_burden dataset")

title: etc5523nhu
text: R package contains data Shiny app exploring burden healthcare-associated infections (HAIs) Germany EU/EEA (Zacher et al., 2019). created part ETC5523 Assignment 4: Turning Analysis Interactive.

title: etc5523nhu
text: can install package directly GitHub using remotes package: load :

title: etc5523nhu
text: package contains dataset hai_burden, derived Table 2 Zacher et al.Â (2019). provides estimates healthcare-associated infection burden per 100 000 population, including: HAIs per 100 000 â€“ number healthcare-associated infections Deaths per 100 000 â€“ deaths attributable HAIs DALYs per 100 000 â€“ disability-adjusted life years combining illness early death across five infection types (HAP, UTI, BSI, SSI, CDI) three sampling groups (German PPS, German Convenience, ECDC EU/EEA). dataset generated using tibble::tribble() reshaped tidyr::pivot_longer(). Random confidence intervals (ci_low, ci_high) added visualise uncertainty. Finally, saved package using:

title: etc5523nhu
text: can launch interactive dashboard using: app allows users : Select measures infection types Compare German EU/EEA estimates Download filtered data analysis Interpret dynamic plots explanatory text bar chart represents estimated infection burden per 100 000 people, error bars showing uncertainty. helps visualise differences regions infection types.

what: HAI Burden Data (Germany and EU/EEA) â€” hai_burden
title: HAI Burden Data (Germany and EU/EEA) â€” hai_burden
text: dataset summarising estimated burden healthcare-associated infections (HAIs) Germany EU/EEA, based Zacher et al. (2019).

title: HAI Burden Data (Germany and EU/EEA) â€” hai_burden
HAI Burden Data (Germany and EU/EEA) â€” hai_burden
text: data frame 90 rows 6 variables: measure Type burden measure (e.g. "HAIs per 100k", "Deaths per 100k", "DALYs per 100k") sample Sampling group: "German_PPS", "German_convenience", "EU_EEA" infection Type infection (HAP, UTI, BSI, SSI, CDI, ) estimate Estimated value per 100,000 population ci_low Lower bound uncertainty interval (simulated) ci_high Upper bound uncertainty interval (simulated)
